
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18777558" title="发布于 2025-03-17 20:51">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">工作面试必备：SQL 中的各种连接 JOIN 的区别总结！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>尽管大多数开发者在日常工作中经常用到Join操作，如Inner Join、Left Join、Right Join等，但在面对特定查询需求时，选择哪种Join类型以及如何使用On和Where子句往往成为一大挑战。特别是对于初学者而言，这些概念可能显得抽象且难以区分。在实际应用中，错误地使用Join类型或混淆On与Where子句的功能，都可能导致数据查询结果的不准确或遗漏关键信息。</span></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong>今天大姚给大家讲解一下SQL中关于Join、Inner Join、Left Join、Right Join、Full Join、On、Where区别和用法。</strong></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247511078&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=9d2c0e2542ce782bcf82b3b53c86403f&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">全面的C#/.NET/.NET Core面试宝典（永久免费）</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247511000&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=95a590f63dc27f714c1d6748c2c70dc0&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">互联网寒冬下，如何写好一份.NET求职简历？附带简洁简历模板和简历优化服务来了！！！</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>SQL连接JOIN图解</span></h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250317204802053-1831278173.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>数据库表结构和对应数据</span></h2>
<blockquote>
<p><span>本文咱们用的是MS Sql Server作为数据操作示例。</span></p>
</blockquote>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Students 学生表：</span></h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250317204818625-1265541661.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Class 班级表：</span></h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250317204829326-499696633.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Join(where联立查询)</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>概念：用于两表或多表之间数据联立查询。</span></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aH2OmlGugoNafibT2uQ5NRr3zm7iavg0AwibkmBsZhib5OpBM69xSqTYLVgicyNOQ5KOmP62XNbB33ZW/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>select * from Students s,Class c&nbsp;where<span>&nbsp;s.ClassId=c.ClassId</span></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250317204842198-1485377435.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Inner Join(内连接查询)</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>概念：与Join相同，两表或多表之间联立查询数据，因此我们在使用多表join查询的时候既可以使用where关联，也可以是inner join关联查询。</span></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aH2OmlGugoNafibT2uQ5NRr3zm7iavg0AwibkmBsZhib5OpBM69xSqTYLVgicyNOQ5KOmP62XNbB33ZW/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>select * from Students s inner join &nbsp;Class c &nbsp;on s.ClassId=c.ClassId<br></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250317204858471-1766016011.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Left Join(左连接查询)</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>概念：以左表中的数据为主，即使与右表中的数据不匹配也会把左表中的所有数据返回。</span></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aH2OmlGugoNafibT2uQ5NRr3zm7iavg0AwibkmBsZhib5OpBM69xSqTYLVgicyNOQ5KOmP62XNbB33ZW/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>select * from Students s left join &nbsp;Class c on s.ClassId=c.ClassId<br></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250317204913436-40123503.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Right Join(右连接查询)</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>概念：与Left Join的用法相反，是以右表中的数据为主，即使左表中不存在匹配数据也会把右表中所有数据返回。</span></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aH2OmlGugoNafibT2uQ5NRr3zm7iavg0AwibkmBsZhib5OpBM69xSqTYLVgicyNOQ5KOmP62XNbB33ZW/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>select * from Students s right join &nbsp;Class c &nbsp;on s.ClassId=c.ClassId</span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250317204926827-1545744931.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Full Join(全连接查询)</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>概念：返回表中所有的数据数据，无论匹配与否。</span></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aH2OmlGugoNafibT2uQ5NRr3zm7iavg0AwibkmBsZhib5OpBM69xSqTYLVgicyNOQ5KOmP62XNbB33ZW/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>select * from Students s Full JOIN &nbsp;Class c &nbsp;on s.ClassId=c.ClassId</span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250317204941101-1504680061.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>On、Where的异同</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>这两个概念中也是绝大多数人无法区分到底它们两者之间有何区别，我什么时候使用On，什么时候使用Where，下面将分别展示两者的异同。</span></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>On条件的作用：</span></h3>
<blockquote>
<p><span>ON的使用无论是左右内全都使用到了On来进行关联！</span></p>
</blockquote>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong>对于inner join 的作用就是起到了与where相同的作用条件筛选：</strong></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aH2OmlGugoNafibT2uQ5NRr3zm7iavg0AwibkmBsZhib5OpBM69xSqTYLVgicyNOQ5KOmP62XNbB33ZW/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>select * from Students s inner join &nbsp;Class c &nbsp;on s.ClassId=c.ClassId and s.Sex='男'</span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250317204955073-1791292048.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong>对于左右连接而言，无论查询条件是否满足都会返回对应所指向的那边的所有数据：</strong></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aH2OmlGugoNafibT2uQ5NRr3zm7iavg0AwibkmBsZhib5OpBM69xSqTYLVgicyNOQ5KOmP62XNbB33ZW/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>select * from Students s left join &nbsp;Class c &nbsp;on s.ClassId=c.ClassId and s.Sex='男'</span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250317205007805-1304006973.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong>对于Full Join 而言无论,只有同时满足的时候才会返回全部关联的数据，假如有一方不满足返回以左边的表数据为基准返回：</strong></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aH2OmlGugoNafibT2uQ5NRr3zm7iavg0AwibkmBsZhib5OpBM69xSqTYLVgicyNOQ5KOmP62XNbB33ZW/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>--全连接<span><br><span>select * from Students s full join &nbsp;Class c &nbsp;on s.ClassId=c.ClassId<span><br><span>&nbsp;<span><br><span>--全连接加on查询<span><br><span>select * from Students s full join &nbsp;Class c &nbsp;on s.ClassId=c.ClassId and s.Sex='男'<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250317205021716-81310161.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250317205026499-971817270.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>WHERE条件的作用：</span></h3>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>WHERE条件在临时表生成后的过滤阶段应用，对最终结果进行筛选。此时LEFT JOIN的“保留左表所有记录”特性已失效，WHERE 会过滤掉不符合条件的行（包括左表记录），如下所示：</span></p>
<blockquote>
<p><span>仅返回右表&nbsp;<code><span>ClassId=1</span></code><span>&nbsp;的匹配记录，左表中无匹配的记录会被过滤掉。</span></span></p>
</blockquote>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aH2OmlGugoNafibT2uQ5NRr3zm7iavg0AwibkmBsZhib5OpBM69xSqTYLVgicyNOQ5KOmP62XNbB33ZW/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>select * from Students s left join Class c on s.ClassId=c.ClassId WHERE c.ClassId=1<span><br></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>区别总结：</span></h3>
<blockquote>
<p><span>一句话概括：ON用作于生成临时表时的条件筛选，WHERE用作于对临时表中的记录进行过滤。</span></p>
</blockquote>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>ON条件是在生成临时表时使用的条件，它不管ON中的条件是否为真，都会返回左边表中的记录（以左连接为例）。</span></li>
<li><span>WHERE条件是在临时表生成好后，再对临时表产生的数据进行过滤条件筛选。</span></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="MySignature" role="contentinfo">
    <blockquote>
